overview: Moomintroll lives in Moominvalley in a tall, cylindrical, blue house built by Moominpappa arter his stormy youth with the Hattifatteners. Moominpappa always carries a black til hat and Moominmamma apron and hand bag. Mommintroll plays with Snorkmaiden, Sniff, Snufkin and Little My. The Groke is a charcter hat most charcters fear.
title: Moomin - Moomin in the West
